mapper.select: (select d.division_cd code, d.division_name name, nvl(sum(credit),0) total from (select * from division) d left outer join (select t.year, t.semester, t.course_id, t.target_grade, t.student_id, t.gp, s.division_cd, c.title, c.credit from takes_test t, section s, course c where t.student_id = #{studentId} and t.year = s.year and t.semester = s.semester and t.course_id = s.course_id and t.target_grade = s.target_grade and t.course_id = c.course_id) t on d.division_cd = t.division_cd group by d.division_cd, division_name, t.student_id) union (select a.abeek_cd code, a.abeek_name name, nvl(sum(abeek_credit), 0) total from (select * from abeek_code) a left outer join (select t.year, t.semester, t.course_id, t.target_grade, t.student_id, t.gp, a.abeek_cd, a.abeek_credit from takes_test t, abeek a where t.student_id = #{studentId} and a.course_id = t.course_id) t on a.abeek_cd = t.abeek_cd group by a.abeek_cd, abeek_name) union (select '01' code,'취득학점' name, nvl(sum(credit),0) total from takes_test t, section s,course c where student_id = #{studentId} and t.course_id = s.course_id and t.year = s.year and t.semester = s.semester and t.target_grade = s.target_grade and t.course_id = c.course_id)
select nvl(round(avg(sc.score),2),0) gpa from takes_test t, score sc where student_id = #{studentId} and t.gp = sc.gp
